sentences.en: a residence permit
sentences.cn: 居留许可证

sentences.en: All single full-time students must reside in university residence halls.
sentences.cn: 所有单身的全日制学生都必须住大学宿舍。

sentences.en: an artist in residence at a college.
sentences.cn: 住在某一大学里的一个艺术家

sentences.en: Every hotel, boarding house and private residence was crowded with sufferers.
sentences.cn: 所有的旅店, 公寓和私人住宅都住满了伤病员.

sentences.en: He took up residence in Australia.
sentences.cn: 他去澳大利亚居住.

sentences.en: In most of the residence halls we visited, rules prohibit disorderly conduct.
sentences.cn: 在我们走访的学生宿舍里，大多明令禁止胡作非为。

sentences.en: It was an old - fashioned residence turned into offices.
sentences.cn: 这是一座老式住宅改成的办公室.

sentences.en: Many large resorts have a doctor in residence.
sentences.cn: 许多大的娱乐场所都有驻院医生.

sentences.en: Rome was his main place of residence .
sentences.cn: 罗马是他的主要居住地。

sentences.en: Rome was his main place of residence.
sentences.cn: 罗马是他的主要居住地。

sentences.en: She moved out of 28 Barbary Lane to take up residence in a house in Pacific Heights.
sentences.cn: 她从巴巴里街28号搬出来，住进了太平洋高地住宅区的一所房子。

sentences.en: the ambassador’s official residence
sentences.cn: 大使官邸

sentences.en: The area of the President's residence is a no-go area after six p.m.
sentences.cn: 总统官邸区域在下午6点钟后禁止进入。

sentences.en: the guests in residence at the hotel.
sentences.cn: 住在该旅店的客人。

sentences.en: The house was terribly small and cramped, but the agent described it as a bijou residence.
sentences.cn: 房子十分狭小拥挤，但经纪人却把它说成是小巧别致的住宅。

sentences.en: the Prime Minister's official residence
sentences.cn: 首相官邸

sentences.en: The royal standard flies when the Queen is in residence.
sentences.cn: 女王的王宫及驻跸处均有王旗为识.

sentences.en: The university has two halls of residence for its postgraduate students.
sentences.cn: 这所大学有两座研究生宿舍.

sentences.en: They had entered the country and had applied for permanent residence.
sentences.cn: 他们已经入境该国，并申请了永久居留权。

sentences.en: Wakoski is writer in residence at Michigan State University.
sentences.cn: 瓦科斯基是密歇根州立大学的常驻作家。

sentences.en: Windsor is open to visitors when the Royal Family is not in residence.
sentences.cn: 王室未在温莎城堡居住期间，城堡会对游客开放。

words.tran_cn: 居住的；住院医师；定居的

phrases.tran_cn: 住在...的：在某一确切的地方居住和工作的，通常在某一段时间内
居住于（某一场所）；占用（某一场所）
n. 依法登记的住址；法定住所
[物理]停留时间；[化]逗留时间（等于residence）

trans.tran_cn: 住处，住宅，居住时间，居住，公馆，驻地
trans.tran_en: legal permission to live in a country for a certain period of time
